parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  COALESCE(cc.enable_ai_analysis, 1) as enable_ai_analysis,
  cc.ai_model_preference,
  cc.ai_temperature,
  sp.prompt_text as filter_prompt
FROM (SELECT 1 as dummy) d
LEFT JOIN client_configurations cc ON cc.client_id = {{ $json.clientId || 0 }}
LEFT JOIN system_prompts sp ON sp.slug = 'keyword-filter' AND sp.is_active = 1
LIMIT 1

=INSERT INTO keyword_results 
  (project_id, keyword, keyword_type, search_volume, cpc, competition, search_intent, keyword_cluster, content_priority, page_type, source)
VALUES 
  ({{ $json.project_id }}, '{{ $json.keyword }}', '{{ $json.keyword_type }}', {{ $json.search_volume || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.cpc || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.competition ? "'" + $json.competition + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.search_intent ? "'" + $json.search_intent + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keyword_cluster ? "'" + $json.keyword_cluster + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.content_priority || 'medium' }}', {{ $json.page_type ? "'" + $json.page_type + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.source }}')
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  search_volume = COALESCE(VALUES(search_volume), search_volume),
  cpc = COALESCE(VALUES(cpc), cpc),
  search_intent = COALESCE(VALUES(search_intent), search_intent),
  keyword_cluster = COALESCE(VALUES(keyword_cluster), keyword_cluster),
  content_priority = COALESCE(VALUES(content_priority), content_priority),
  page_type = COALESCE(VALUES(page_type), page_type)
